hero.name: Diogo Azevedo
hero.description: Junior developer passionate about building innovative and high-impact web solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a motivated junior developer, recently graduated from a CTeSP (Professional Higher Technical Course) in Web and Multimedia Development, where I built a solid foundation in front-end and back-end. I’m excited to start my career in the field and I’m continually learning and building projects that solve real-world problems.

frontend.name: Frontend Development
frontend.description: React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS

design.name: Design & Tools
design.description: Responsive Design, Figma basics, Git & GitHub

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: My coding journey began with curiosity about how websites work, which led me to take several online courses and later enroll in a short-cycle higher education programme in Web and Multimedia Development. I’ve built several personal projects to practice my skills and I’m continuously learning through online courses, coding challenges, and contributing to open-source projects. I’m excited to bring my fresh perspective and energy to a development team where I can keep growing.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Here are some projects I've built while learning to code. Each one taught me something new and helped me grow as a developer.

items.title: Personal Finance Tracker
items.description: A responsive web app to track expenses and income with interactive charts. Built as a learning project to practice React hooks and local storage.

items.title: Recipe Finder App
items.description: A fun project that helps users find recipes based on ingredients they have. Integrated with a recipe API and features a clean, intuitive interface.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: This very portfolio! Built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects and skills. Features smooth animations and responsive design.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm actively looking for my first developer role and excited about opportunities to learn and contribute to meaningful projects.

cta.title: Ready to Start My Career?
cta.description: I'm eager to join a team where I can contribute, learn, and grow as a developer. Let's connect and discuss how I can add value to your projects.
